metadata.title: CVE-2019-20018 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A stack-based buffer over-read was discovered in ReadNextCell in mat5.c in matio 1.5.17.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio11 - 1.5.19-2
matio-tools - 1.5.19-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmatio package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.19-2').
